title: New: Formation – Back Then
content:
London duo Formation are getting rather good at this.

Their debut EP, released last year, saw them doing things slightly different, avoiding the usual straight to Soundcloud / Spotify route, instead pushing everything through a Youtube channel. Now, having made their live debut, and with a run of shows around Europe coming up, they’ve released their latest track, Back Then, a more expansive, yet still disco inspired number – deliriously energetic and their most over the top outing to date. Back Then is taken from the Young Ones EP, out 23 March.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
